0:
SELECT MIN(cn.name) AS company_name,
       MIN(lt.link) AS link_type,
       MIN(t.title) AS western_follow_up
FROM company_name AS cn,
     company_type AS ct,
     keyword AS k,
     link_type AS lt,
     movie_companies AS mc,
     movie_info AS mi,
     movie_keyword AS mk,
     movie_link AS ml,
     title AS t
WHERE cn.country_code !='[pl]'
  AND (cn.name LIKE '%Film%'
       OR cn.name LIKE '%Warner%')
  AND ct.kind ='production companies'
  AND k.keyword ='sequel'
  AND lt.link LIKE '%follow%'
  AND mc.note IS NULL
  AND mi.info IN ('Sweden',
                  'Norway',
                  'Germany',
                  'Denmark',
                  'Swedish',
                  'Denish',
                  'Norwegian',
                  'German')
  AND t.production_year BETWEEN 1950 AND 2000
  AND lt.id = ml.link_type_id
  AND ml.movie_id = t.id
  AND t.id = mk.movie_id
  AND mk.keyword_id = k.id
  AND t.id = mc.movie_id
  AND mc.company_type_id = ct.id
  AND mc.company_id = cn.id
  AND mi.movie_id = t.id
  AND ml.movie_id = mk.movie_id
  AND ml.movie_id = mc.movie_id
  AND mk.movie_id = mc.movie_id
  AND ml.movie_id = mi.movie_id
  AND mk.movie_id = mi.movie_id
  AND mc.movie_id = mi.movie_id;
1:
SELECT MIN(cn.name) AS company_name,
       MIN(lt.link) AS link_type,
       MIN(t.title) AS western_follow_up
    FROM company_name AS cn,
        company_type AS ct,
        keyword AS k,
        link_type AS lt,
        movie_companies AS mc,
        movie_info AS mi,
        movie_keyword AS mk,
        movie_link AS ml,
        title AS t
    WHERE cn.country_code ='[us]'
    AND ct.kind = 'production companies'
    AND k.keyword IN ('murder', 'violence', 'blood', 'gore', 'death', 'female-nudity', 'hospital')
    AND lt.link LIKE '%follow%'
    AND mc.note NOT LIKE '%(TV)%' AND mc.note LIKE '%(USA)%'
    AND mi.info IS NOT NULL AND (mi.info LIKE 'Japan:%201%' OR mi.info LIKE 'USA:%201%')
    AND t.production_year BETWEEN 2000 AND 2010
    AND lt.id = ml.link_type_id
    AND ml.movie_id = t.id
    AND t.id = mk.movie_id
    AND mk.keyword_id = k.id
    AND t.id = mc.movie_id
    AND mc.company_type_id = ct.id
    AND mc.company_id = cn.id
    AND mi.movie_id = t.id
    AND ml.movie_id = mk.movie_id
    AND ml.movie_id = mc.movie_id
    AND mk.movie_id = mc.movie_id
    AND ml.movie_id = mi.movie_id
    AND mk.movie_id = mi.movie_id
    AND mc.movie_id = mi.movie_id;

SELECT MIN(cn.name) AS company_name,
       MIN(lt.link) AS link_type,
       MIN(t.title) AS western_follow_up
    FROM company_name AS cn,
        company_type AS ct,
        keyword AS k,
        link_type AS lt,
        movie_companies AS mc,
        movie_info AS mi,
        movie_keyword AS mk,
        movie_link AS ml,
        title AS t
    WHERE cn.country_code ='[us]'
  AND cn.name = 'DreamWorks Animation'
    AND ct.kind = 'production companies'
    AND k.keyword ='sequel'
    AND lt.link ='features'
    AND mc.note LIKE '%(200%)%' AND mc.note LIKE '%(worldwide)%'
    AND mi.note LIKE '%internet%' AND mi.info IS NOT NULL AND (mi.info LIKE 'USA:% 199%' OR mi.info LIKE 'USA:% 200%')
    AND t.production_year > 2000
    AND lt.id = ml.link_type_id
    AND ml.movie_id = t.id
    AND t.id = mk.movie_id
    AND mk.keyword_id = k.id
    AND t.id = mc.movie_id
    AND mc.company_type_id = ct.id
    AND mc.company_id = cn.id
    AND mi.movie_id = t.id
    AND ml.movie_id = mk.movie_id
    AND ml.movie_id = mc.movie_id
    AND mk.movie_id = mc.movie_id
    AND ml.movie_id = mi.movie_id
    AND mk.movie_id = mi.movie_id
    AND mc.movie_id = mi.movie_id;

SELECT MIN(cn.name) AS company_name,
       MIN(lt.link) AS link_type,
       MIN(t.title) AS western_follow_up
    FROM company_name AS cn,
        company_type AS ct,

        link_type AS lt,
        movie_companies AS mc,

        title AS t
    WHERE cn.country_code ='[us]'
    AND ct.kind = 'production companies'
    AND k.keyword LIKE '%sequel%'
    AND lt.link LIKE '%follow%'
    AND mc.note NOT LIKE '%(as Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer Pictures)%' AND (mc.note LIKE '%(co-production)%')
    AND mi.info IS NOT NULL AND (mi.info LIKE 'Japan:%200%' OR mi.info LIKE 'USA:%200%')
    AND t.production_year > 2014
    AND lt.id = ml.link_type_id
    AND ml.movie_id = t.id
    AND t.id = mk.movie_id
    AND mk.keyword_id = k.id
    AND t.id = mc.movie_id

    AND mc.company_id = cn.id
    AND mi.movie_id = t.id
    AND ml.movie_id = mk.movie_id
    AND ml.movie_id = mc.movie_id
    AND mk.movie_id = mc.movie_id
    AND ml.movie_id = mi.movie_id
    AND mk.movie_id = mi.movie_id
    AND mc.movie_id = mi.movie_id;

SELECT MIN(cn.name) AS company_name,
       MIN(lt.link) AS link_type,
       MIN(t.title) AS western_follow_up
    FROM company_name AS cn,
        company_type AS ct,
        keyword AS k,
        link_type AS lt,
        movie_companies AS mc,
        movie_info AS mi,
        movie_keyword AS mk,
        movie_link AS ml,
        title AS t
    WHERE cn.country_code !='[pl]' AND (cn.name LIKE '20th Century Fox%' OR cn.name LIKE 'Twentieth Century Fox%')
    AND ct.kind = 'production companies'
    AND k.keyword ='sequel'
    AND lt.link ='features'
    AND mc.note LIKE '%(VHS)%' AND mc.note LIKE '%(USA)%' AND mc.note LIKE '%(1994)%'
    AND mi.info IN ('Drama', 'Horror')
    AND t.production_year > 2005
    AND lt.id = ml.link_type_id
    AND ml.movie_id = t.id
    AND t.id = mk.movie_id
    AND mk.keyword_id = k.id
    AND t.id = mc.movie_id
    AND mc.company_type_id = ct.id
    AND mc.company_id = cn.id
    AND mi.movie_id = t.id
    AND ml.movie_id = mk.movie_id
    AND ml.movie_id = mc.movie_id
    AND mk.movie_id = mc.movie_id
    AND ml.movie_id = mi.movie_id
    AND mk.movie_id = mi.movie_id
    AND mc.movie_id = mi.movie_id;

SELECT MIN(cn.name) AS company_name,
       MIN(lt.link) AS link_type,
       MIN(t.title) AS western_follow_up
    FROM company_name AS cn,
        company_type AS ct,
        keyword AS k,
        link_type AS lt,
        movie_companies AS mc,

    WHERE cn.name LIKE 'Lionsgate%'
    AND ct.kind = 'production companies'
    AND k.keyword IN ('superhero', 'sequel', 'second-part', 'marvel-comics', 'based-on-comic', 'tv-special', 'fight', 'violence')
    AND lt.link LIKE '%follows%'
    AND mc.note IS NULL
    AND mi.info IN ('Sweden', 'Norway', 'Germany', 'Denmark', 'Swedish', 'Denish', 'Norwegian', 'German', 'USA', 'American')
    AND t.title != '' AND (t.title LIKE 'Champion%' OR t.title LIKE 'Loser%')
    AND lt.id = ml.link_type_id
    AND ml.movie_id = t.id
    AND t.id = mk.movie_id
    AND mk.keyword_id = k.id
    AND t.id = mc.movie_id
    AND mc.company_type_id = ct.id
    AND mc.company_id = cn.id
    AND mi.movie_id = t.id
    AND ml.movie_id = mk.movie_id
    AND ml.movie_id = mc.movie_id
    AND mk.movie_id = mc.movie_id
    AND ml.movie_id = mi.movie_id
    AND mk.movie_id = mi.movie_id
    AND mc.movie_id = mi.movie_id;

    AND t.id = mc.movie_id

    AND ml.movie_id = mk.movie_id

SELECT MIN(cn.name) AS company_name,
       MIN(lt.link) AS link_type,
       MIN(t.title) AS western_follow_up
    FROM company_name AS cn,
        company_type AS ct,
        keyword AS k,
        link_type AS lt,
        movie_companies AS mc,
        movie_info AS mi,
        movie_keyword AS mk,
        movie_link AS ml,
        title AS t
    WHERE cn.name LIKE 'Lionsgate%'
    AND ct.kind = 'production companies'
    AND k.keyword IN ('murder', 'blood', 'gore', 'death', 'female-nudity')
    AND lt.link IN ('references', 'referenced in', 'features', 'featured in')
    AND mc.note LIKE '%(Japan)%' AND mc.note NOT LIKE '%(USA)%'
    AND mi.info IN ('USA', 'America')
    AND t.production_year > 2000
    AND lt.id = ml.link_type_id
    AND ml.movie_id = t.id
    AND t.id = mk.movie_id
    AND mk.keyword_id = k.id
    AND t.id = mc.movie_id
    AND mc.company_type_id = ct.id
    AND mc.company_id = cn.id
    AND mi.movie_id = t.id
    AND ml.movie_id = mk.movie_id
    AND ml.movie_id = mc.movie_id
    AND mk.movie_id = mc.movie_id
    AND ml.movie_id = mi.movie_id
    AND mk.movie_id = mi.movie_id
    AND mc.movie_id = mi.movie_id;

SELECT MIN(cn.name) AS company_name,
       MIN(lt.link) AS link_type,
       MIN(t.title) AS western_follow_up
    FROM company_name AS cn,
        company_type AS ct,
        keyword AS k,
        link_type AS lt,
        movie_companies AS mc,
        movie_info AS mi,
        movie_keyword AS mk,
        movie_link AS ml,
        title AS t
    WHERE cn.country_code ='[us]'
    AND ct.kind = 'production companies'
    AND k.keyword IN ('superhero', 'sequel', 'second-part', 'marvel-comics', 'based-on-comic', 'tv-special', 'fight', 'violence')
    AND lt.link IN ('references', 'referenced in', 'features', 'featured in')
    AND mc.note IS NOT NULL
    AND mi.info IN ('Sweden', 'Norway', 'Germany', 'Denmark', 'Swedish', 'Denish', 'Norwegian', 'German', 'English')
    AND t.production_year > 2000
  AND (t.title LIKE '%Freddy%'
       OR t.title LIKE '%Jason%'
       OR t.title LIKE 'Saw%')
    AND lt.id = ml.link_type_id
    AND ml.movie_id = t.id
    AND t.id = mk.movie_id
    AND mk.keyword_id = k.id
    AND t.id = mc.movie_id
    AND mc.company_type_id = ct.id
    AND mc.company_id = cn.id
    AND mi.movie_id = t.id
    AND ml.movie_id = mk.movie_id
    AND ml.movie_id = mc.movie_id
    AND mk.movie_id = mc.movie_id
    AND ml.movie_id = mi.movie_id
    AND mk.movie_id = mi.movie_id
    AND mc.movie_id = mi.movie_id;

    AND lt.link LIKE '%follow%'

       MIN(lt.link) AS link_type,
       MIN(t.title) AS western_follow_up
    FROM company_name AS cn,

        keyword AS k,

        title AS t
    WHERE cn.country_code ='[us]'
    AND ct.kind IS NOT NULL AND (ct.kind ='production companies' OR ct.kind = 'distributors')
    AND k.keyword IN ('superhero', 'sequel', 'second-part', 'marvel-comics', 'based-on-comic', 'tv-special', 'fight', 'violence')
    AND lt.link LIKE '%follow%'
    AND mc.note LIKE '%(Blu-ray)%'
    AND mi.note LIKE '%internet%' AND mi.info IS NOT NULL AND (mi.info LIKE 'USA:% 199%' OR mi.info LIKE 'USA:% 200%')
    AND t.production_year BETWEEN 1980 AND 2010
    AND lt.id = ml.link_type_id
    AND ml.movie_id = t.id

    AND mk.keyword_id = k.id
    AND t.id = mc.movie_id

    AND mc.movie_id = mi.movie_id;

SELECT MIN(cn.name) AS company_name,
       MIN(lt.link) AS link_type,
       MIN(t.title) AS western_follow_up
    FROM company_name AS cn,
        company_type AS ct,
        keyword AS k,
        link_type AS lt,
        movie_companies AS mc,
        movie_info AS mi,
        movie_keyword AS mk,
        movie_link AS ml,
        title AS t
    WHERE cn.country_code ='[us]'
  AND cn.name = 'DreamWorks Animation'
    AND ct.kind = 'production companies'
    AND k.keyword ='character-name-in-title'
    AND lt.link IN ('sequel', 'follows', 'followed by')
    AND mc.note NOT LIKE '%(as Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer Pictures)%'
    AND mi.info IN ('Sweden', 'Germany', 'Swedish', 'German')
    AND t.production_year > 2000
    AND lt.id = ml.link_type_id
    AND ml.movie_id = t.id
    AND t.id = mk.movie_id
    AND mk.keyword_id = k.id
    AND t.id = mc.movie_id
    AND mc.company_type_id = ct.id
    AND mc.company_id = cn.id
    AND mi.movie_id = t.id
    AND ml.movie_id = mk.movie_id
    AND ml.movie_id = mc.movie_id
    AND mk.movie_id = mc.movie_id
    AND ml.movie_id = mi.movie_id
    AND mk.movie_id = mi.movie_id
    AND mc.movie_id = mi.movie_id;
18:
SELECT MIN(cn.name) AS company_name,
       MIN(lt.link) AS link_type,
       MIN(t.title) AS western_follow_up
    FROM company_name AS cn,
        company_type AS ct,
        keyword AS k,
        link_type AS lt,
        movie_companies AS mc,
        movie_info AS mi,
        movie_keyword AS mk,
        movie_link AS ml,
        title AS t
    WHERE cn.country_code = '[ru]'
    AND ct.kind = 'production companies'
    AND k.keyword IN ('murder', 'blood', 'gore', 'death', 'female-nudity')
    AND lt.link LIKE '%follow%'
    AND mc.note IS NOT NULL AND (mc.note LIKE '%(USA)%' OR mc.note LIKE '%(worldwide)%')
    AND mi.info IN ('Sweden', 'Germany', 'Swedish', 'German')
    AND t.episode_nr >= 50 AND t.episode_nr < 100
    AND lt.id = ml.link_type_id
    AND ml.movie_id = t.id
    AND t.id = mk.movie_id
    AND mk.keyword_id = k.id
    AND t.id = mc.movie_id
    AND mc.company_type_id = ct.id
    AND mc.company_id = cn.id
    AND mi.movie_id = t.id
    AND ml.movie_id = mk.movie_id
    AND ml.movie_id = mc.movie_id
    AND mk.movie_id = mc.movie_id
    AND ml.movie_id = mi.movie_id
    AND mk.movie_id = mi.movie_id
    AND mc.movie_id = mi.movie_id;
